text: Demopsestis punctigera is a moth in the family Drepanidae. It was described by Arthur Gardiner Butler in 1885. It is found in Japan, KoreaA Faunistic Study of Moths on Wolchulsan National Park and the Chinese provinces ofFaunistic Data of Thyatiridae (Lepidoptera) in the Mt. Changbai of China Jilin, Shaanxi and Jiangsu. The wingspan is 33–40 mm.Japanese Moths ==References== Category:Moths described in 1885 Category:Thyatirinae
title: Demopsestis punctigera
